string.name: message
string.value: Increasing Stats: How to Get Mega Tough
Starting at Lv. 10, you can open the Character Stat (S key) window and assign AP to your stats.
Raise your class's important stats to become a powerhouse!\n
\n#e1. Ability Point#n: Points you can assign to increase your stats.
\n#e2. Auto-Assign#n: Auto-Assign AP based on your class.
-STR: Determines the attack power of Warriors and Pirates (Brawlers)
-DEX: Determines the attack power of Bowmen and Pirates (Gunslingers)
-INT: Determines the attack power of Magicians
-LUK: Determines the Accuracy of Magicians and attack power of Thieves#n
\n#bTIP: Click on Auto-Assign to distribute AP to your stats based on your class.

The Mushking Empire is in danger! The kingdom has been overtaken by the evil King Pepe and the lovely Princess Violetta is being forced to marry his filthy son, Prince Giuseppe! Help the Mushking defeat King Pepe and rescue Princess Violetta!
You will receive an invitation to the Mushroom after your 2nd Job Advancement. You can usually use this invitation to get back any time.
You can also enter from the Ghost Mushroom Forest near Henesys.
Enter the Mushroom Castle to find the mushrooms that were driven out by the Pepes.
First, help the Mushking finish his tasks, then speak to the other mushrooms.
\nTo enter the Mushroom Castle, you must first remove the Barrier of the Magic Spore and the thorny vines blocking the entrance.
Helping the mushrooms will should give you everything you need to get into the Mushroom Castle.
\nEnter the castle to challenge King Pepe's henchmen, such as Helmet Pepes.
Eliminate these monsters and reach the Entrance to Wedding Hall to begin the Bringing Down King Pepe quest.
\nWhen you begin Bringing Down King Pepe, King Pepe will appear on his Yeti.
If you can win 3 times, you will get the Wedding Hall Key. Use this key to proceed to the Saving Violetta quest.
\nTake the Saving Violetta quest at the Entrance to Wedding Hall to aid Violetta in defeating the Prime Minister.
Eliminate the Prime Minister and return to Mushroom Castle town to complete the quest.

string.name: message
string.value: Help Enin support Blake's Autograph Event!

After finding success as a musical artist, Blake is returning to Kerning Square for an autograph signing event. Enin, one of his biggest fans, wants your help and support for this event to be one of the most awesome events of all time.
Start by clicking the light bulb icon on the left. Find the Blake's Autographs quest and accept it to teleport to Kerning Square Lobby.
Once you arrive at Kerning Square Lobby, talk to Enin to officially begin the quest.

\nFirst, help Enin get a ticket to Blake's event by defeating Bubble Teas. After that, You will be helping out with preparing the event through a series of quests where you must liaise with a record executive, a make-up artist, hair designer, and a composer. You will even have to obtain perfumes, CDs, hats, and many more to make sure the event is successful.

\nWhen you are almost done helping out, Lala will ask you for help finding out the cause of why Blake has changed. Go to the top of Kerning Square and talk to Blake's old friend June to find out more and then ask Blake and Lana about it. After You are done talking to Lana, click the Light Bulb icon to learn what Blake's True Self has to say by accepting the Like the First Time quest. Accept Blake's True Self's request to retrieve Blake's Memories and go back to the top of Kerning Square to defeat Spirit of Rock and his Amplifier minions.
\nOnce you defeat the Spirit of Rock and his Amplifier minions, talk to Blake's True Self again and obtain Blake's Memories.
Return to Kerning Square Lobby and present Blake his memories.
Blake will thank you for all your hard work and will give you your reward completing the quest.
Various continents exist in Maple World. If you wish to encounter stronger monsters and more interesting stories, journey across different continents right now!
To travel to different continents, you must use the transportation method provided by the stations on each continent.
Connects To: Pond in Korean Folk Town
Connect To: The Sharp Unknown/Herb Town/Sea of Fog
Connects To: Victoria Island/Ludibrium/Leafre/Ariant/Mu Lung Garden/Ereve/Edelstein

string.name: message
string.value: Obtain Moon Bunny's Rice Cake from Growlie!
#b#p1012112##k at #b#m100000200##k is looking for adventurers who can find #r#t04001101##k for #b#p1012114##k. Go to Primrose Hill, the home of the Moon Bunny.
\n1. Eliminate the Pigs and retrieve the Primrose Seeds they stole.
2. Plant the seeds at the designated locations. The Moon Bunny will appear once 6 Primroses bloom.
3. Protect the Moon Bunny from the violent animals until it makes #r10 Rice Cakes#k.
4. Bring the Rice Cakes to Tory to receive a gift.
\n#e-Getting There#n: Dimensional Mirror in each town
#b#p9020000##k of #b#m103000000##k is searching for brave explorers. Use the #bDimensional Mirror#k to meet up with Lakelis and complete her requests, then defeat the #r#o9300003##k!
Stage 2: Find the rope to the next stage
Stage 3: Find the cat platform to the next area
\n#e-Getting There#n: Dimensional Mirror in each town
A three-player party, all Lv. 50 or higher, is required to do the First Time Together Party Quest. Click "First Time Together" from the Dimensional Mirror or Move Quickly menu in each town to start.

First Time Together is comprised of 5 stages total. The quest is complete once you eliminate King Slime. Each party member is to complete the given missions and the party leader must talk to Cloto to proceed to the next stage.
\n#bTIP: Assign the roles of party leader and party members and collaborate in solving the quiz.

string.name: message
string.value: Stop the monsters that came through the Dimensional Crack!

Oh no! A Dimensional Crack was found at #b#m220000000##k! In order to prevent otherworldly monsters from invading, we need courageous explorers to seal it up. Use the #bDimensional Mirror#k to travel to the crack.
\nStage 1: Eliminate all Ratz and Black Ratz
Stage 2: Eliminate all monsters behind the door
Stage 3: Enter the hidden portal on top of the box
\n#e-Getting There#n: Dimensional Mirror in each town

string.name: message
string.value: Help Jun, who's been cursed by the Ice Knight!
#b#p2159018##k at #b#m932000000##k is looking for adventures to help #b#p2159017##k, who has been cursed by #b#o9300442##k. Use the Dimensional Mirror to get to the Dangerous Forest.
\n#e-Getting There#n: Dimensional Mirror in each town
The hero Tristan dropped Lord Balrog to the bottom of the Cursed Temple, but the seal on his tomb was never completed. Defeat Lord Balrog and put a lid on his enormous power.
Sleepywood, at the end of Cursed Temple
To fight against the Lord Balrog, you must head to "Bottom of the Temple".
To get there, you can walk from Sleepywood, or you can get there through Manji in Perion. Once you reach Bottom of the Temple, talk to Mu Young to enter Balrog's Altar.
Once the battle with Lord Balrog begins, your stats will decrease and a buff that forbids you from using 3rd and 4th job skills will take effect. Take note that this buff cannot be removed.
\n#bTIP: If the Balrog tries to recover its HP through the altar, attack the altar with normal attacks.
#bTIP: When the damage reflect skill activates, stop your attacks. If you keep attacking at this time, damage dealt will be reflected back to you.
\n#e-Players#n : Balrog Expedition of 1 or more players
To fight against Lord Balrog, you must create a Balrog Expedition comprised of at least 1 player.

string.name: message
string.value: Save the giants who are in danger!
There's trouble brewing at Chryse, the island above Orbis where giants live. Xer, Michaela's pet mountain goat, got hold of an evil power by accident. Save the giants from this evil.
\nGet there through Ericsson at Orbis Park

string.name: message
string.value: Defeat the monsters in the Monster Park!
#e-Recommended Level#n: Lv. 60 - 69, have Monster Park Ticket
#e-Getting There#n: Monster Park Shuttle in each town or use the Move Quickly menu
Spiegelmann's Badge Chest (30 Monster Park Commemorative Coins needed)
Spiegelmann's Mustache (50 Monster Park Commemorative Coins needed)
Spiegelmann's Autograph (100 Monster Park Commemorative Coins needed)
Spiegelmann's Hot-Air Balloon 7-Day Coupon (70 Monster Park Commemorative Coins needed)
The Monster Park is where Spiegelmann keeps the monsters he collected while traveling Maple World. Make a party and defeat the monsters to obtain additional EXP and special items.
#b(Use the Monster Park Shuttle parked in town)
\nUse the Monster Park Shuttle parked in each town to enter the Monster Park.
You'll need a ticket to get in. Collect "ticket pieces" by hunting monsters on normal maps and exchanging them for a full ticket through Mary at the Monster Park.
You can also purchase tickets directly from Mary at the Monster Park (max 5 tickets per day, no matter the ticket type).
#b(Collect ticket pieces and exchange them for a ticket)
#b(Bring the pieces to Mary to get a full ticket)
Use the Party Search, hotkey (O), or recruit people on your channel to make a party.
Once a party has been formed, you can jump into the Monster Park. The party leader can enter the park and select the dungeon.
#b(Select a dungeon through the portals next to Spiegelmann)
#bTIP: Don't forget to grab those "Monster Park Commemorative Coins" from monsters in the Monster Park! Laku the merchant will give you special items.
#rNett's Pyramid#k was buried deep inside the desert for ages, but has recently resurfaced! Go to to the pyramid to challenge the Pharaoh Yeti.
\n#e-Getting There#n: Dimensional Mirror in each town
For the Nett's Pyramid Party Quest, you need 4 users that are Lv. 60 or higher.
First, complete the "In Search of the Mysterious Pyramid" quest from Byron in Ariant.
#b(Go see Byron in Ariant to start the quest)
\nIf you completed the quest, go to the Dimensional Mirror in each town (can also be accessed through Move Quickly menu) and click "Nett's Pyramid". Afterwards, talk to Duarte and enter the pyramid.
#b(Click on Move Quickly menu and select "Nett's Pyramid")
#b(Talk to Duarte to enter the pyramid)
Once you enter the pyramid, various monsters will be summoned from the rightmost path on 1st - 4th floors in each stage.
Summoned monsters will move to the left to destroy the Obelisk, the holy artifact of Nett. Stop the monsters from destroying the Obelisk!
\n#eUse various eye items, each with different effects!
You can obtain points by defeating the summoned monsters. Use these points to purchase various eye items that can enhance your character or inflict abnormal status on monsters.

string.name: message
string.value: Defeat the monsters in the Monster Park!
#e-Recommended Level#n: Lv. 70 - 79, have Monster Park Ticket
#e-Getting There#n: Monster Park Shuttle in each town or use the Move Quickly menu
Spiegelmann's Badge Chest (30 Monster Park Commemorative Coins needed)
Spiegelmann's Mustache (50 Monster Park Commemorative Coins needed)
Spiegelmann's Autograph (100 Monster Park Commemorative Coins needed)
Spiegelmann's Hot-Air Balloon 7-Day Coupon (70 Monster Park Commemorative Coins needed)
The journey to rescue the goddess of #b#m200000000##k begins! Use the #bDimensional Mirror#k to go to the Tower of Minerva.
\nLobby: Find the record and play it on the record player
Storage Room: Eliminate the Celions in the order they appear
Strolling Path: Eliminate the Pixies and collect their pieces
The Road Up: Find the platform with the answer and take it up
Statue Hall: Fix the statue using the pieces you collected
\n#e-Getting There#n: Dimensional Mirror in each town

The star-crossed lovers of #b#m261000000##k, #b#p2112004##k and #b#p2112003##k, need your help. Use the #bDimensional Mirror#k to meet Romeo and Juliet, and find the true cause of the hatred between the Zenumists and Alcadnos!
\nStage 1: Find the strange switch inside the laboratory
Stage 3: Collect the Suspicious Liquid inside the Beaker
Stage 4: Enter the Dark Lab and obtain the experimental data
Stage 5: After eliminating the monsters, look for another strange switch
Stage 6: Locate the correct footholds and climb up
\n#e-Getting There#n: Dimensional Mirror in each town
The #r#o9300119##k has launched a surprise attack on #b#m251000000##k! Use the #bDimensional Mirror#k to the cell where #b#p2094001##k, the King of Bellflowers, is being held!

#e-Time Limit#n:
 1) Stage 1: 4 min
 2) Stage 2: 7 min
 3) Stage 3: 5 min
 4) Stage 4: 6 min
\n#e-Getting There#n: Dimensional Mirror in each town

The #bBroken Gate of Time on the 101st floor of Helios Tower#k is said to have the power to fling daring adventurers into the past, where the Fairy of Ellin Forest awaits a hero to save her polluted forest.
\n#e-Getting There#n: Dimensional Mirror in each town

string.name: message
string.value: Defeat the monsters in the Monster Park!
#e-Recommended Level#n: Lv. 75 - 84, have Monster Park Ticket
#e-Getting There#n: Monster Park Shuttle in each town or use the Move Quickly menu
Spiegelmann's Badge Chest (30 Monster Park Commemorative Coins needed)
Spiegelmann's Mustache (50 Monster Park Commemorative Coins needed)
Spiegelmann's Autograph (100 Monster Park Commemorative Coins needed)
Spiegelmann's Hot-Air Balloon 7-Day Coupon (70 Monster Park Commemorative Coins needed)

string.name: message
string.value: Defeat the monsters in the Monster Park!
#e-Recommended Level#n: Lv. 80 - 89, have Monster Park Ticket
#e-Getting There#n: Monster Park Shuttle in each town or use the Move Quickly menu
Spiegelmann's Badge Chest (30 Monster Park Commemorative Coins needed)
Spiegelmann's Mustache (50 Monster Park Commemorative Coins needed)
Spiegelmann's Autograph (100 Monster Park Commemorative Coins needed)
Spiegelmann's Hot-Air Balloon 7-Day Coupon (70 Monster Park Commemorative Coins needed)

string.name: message
string.value: Defeat the monsters in the Monster Park!
#e-Recommended Level#n: Lv. 85 - 94, have Monster Park Ticket
#e-Getting There#n: Monster Park Shuttle in each town or use the Move Quickly menu
Spiegelmann's Badge Chest (30 Monster Park Commemorative Coins needed)
Spiegelmann's Mustache (50 Monster Park Commemorative Coins needed)
Spiegelmann's Autograph (100 Monster Park Commemorative Coins needed)
Spiegelmann's Hot-Air Balloon 7-Day Coupon (70 Monster Park Commemorative Coins needed)
#rNett's Pyramid#k was buried deep inside the desert for ages, but has recently resurfaced! Go to to the pyramid to challenge the Pharaoh Yeti.
\n#e-Getting There#n: Dimensional Mirror in each town

string.name: message
string.value: Take a journey back in time!

Spiegelmann brings you some interesting news. Time has stopped in the Toy Castle of Ludibrium and the Clocktower to preserve the innocence of childhood. However, one of the towers started malfunctioning and it's allowing people to slip through time... to the past! Let's hurry on over to Helios Tower to go on a mysterious journey through time.
Helios Tower 101st Floor, Broken Gate of Time

string.name: message
string.value: Defeat Zakum and save the underground tribe!
Deep inside of El Nath Dead Mine, a statue of worship has been mutated into a thing of terror by a corrupted Zakum tree. Save the underground tribe by defeating Zakum.
\n#e-Party Size#n: Zakum Expedition of at least 1 player
Deep Inside the Dead Mine in El Nath

string.name: message
string.value: Remove the seal on Lion King's Castle!

Krag, a Silent Crusade agent has sent a letter. Icy terror and dark energy can be felt from Lion King's Castle at El Nath, but his investigation is stopped because of the magic wards there. Help him defeat the dark energy!
Read "Desolate Castle" from the Maple Mailbox
\n#e-Players#n : Zakum Expedition of 1 or more players
Luden's Mastery Book, Heart of a Lion

string.name: message
string.value: Discover the true identity of the Dragon Rider!

Use the #bDimensional Mirror#k to get to the #b<Heavenly Doorway>#k, where the true identity of the #rDragon Rider#k awaits. You might be able to catch him if you use the #bSoaring#k skill. Keep up your pursuit and defeat any Wyverns you see along the way.
\n#e-Getting There#n: Dimensional Mirror in each town
#b#p9020003##k at #b#m923040000##k is looking for someone to get #bKenta#k out of danger. Use the Dimensional Mirror to go to Forked Road: Dangerous Sea.
2. Defeat the monsters and get 20 Air Bubbles for Kenta before he drowns.
3. Protect Kenta from the enraged sea creatures for 3 minutes.
4. Defeat Pianus inside the Dangerous Cave to help Kenta's research.
\n#e-Getting There#n: Dimensional Mirror in each town

string.name: message
string.value: Rescue the prisoners at Aerial Prison!
#bJenn#k at #b#m923040000##k is looking for adventurers to rescue inmates from the Hidden Tower's Aerial Prison.
\n1. Evade the obstacles and infiltrate the prison.
2. Eliminate all guards on the map.
3. Make it through the maze and find the prison entrance.
4. Eliminate all guards protecting the prison door.
5. Evade the booby traps and get into the Aerial Prison.
6. Eliminate all guards and find the Prison Key.
7. Defeat Prison Guard Ani and free the prisoners.
\n#e-Getting There#n: Dimensional Mirror in each town

string.name: message
string.value: Discover the true identity of the Dragon Rider!
The Seal Stone that once held #r#o9300281##k at bay is losing its power. Take the #bDimensional Mirror#k to meet with #b#p2022005##k before the beast escapes his bonds!
\n#e-Getting There#n: Dimensional Mirror in each town

string.name: message
string.value: Let an intense battle unfold at the Ghost Ship!
Participate in #b#eParty vs. Party Raid#n#k where two parties enter and the #bparty that defeats the boss first#k wins.
\n#e-Participation Condition#n: 3-Person Party comprised of Lv. 120 - 159 characters
\n#e-Getting There#n: Dimensional Mirror in each town
Can be obtained from Ghost Ship Captain\n
Ghost Ship is a 3-on-3 competitive mode.
The team that defeats the boss within the time limit wins
To start Ghost Ship, you must first do the "Rumor on the Sea of Fog" quest from "Captain Hwang" in Herb Town.
Once you complete the quest, go to the Ghost Ship and the Sea of Fog through the Dimensional Mirror in each town or through the "Dolphin Taxi" in Herb Town.
Ghost Ship can only be done when in a party. Click the Party Search, hotkey (O), or recruit players in the same channel to create a party.
Once the party has been formed, you can officially begin the bout at Ghost Ship. Once the party leader talk to Norrington to create a room and the opposing team is set, the game begins.
Including the final fight with Ghost Ship, there are a total of 6 stages. Cooperate with party members to clear the stages quickly. The team that defeats the Ghost Ship Captain first wins.

string.name: message
string.value: Defeat Von Leon the Lion King!
Von Leon the Lion King, who sold his soul to the Black Mage to seek revenge, has returned. Defeat Von Leon!
\n#e-Party Size#n: Von Leon Expedition of at least 1 player
Go to Lion King's Castle from El Nath

string.name: message
string.value: Defeat Pianus deep beneath the ocean!
In the Aquarium Deep Sea, a trapped monster named Pianus is terrorizing the locals. Defeat Pianus.
\n#e-Players#n : Von Leon Expedition of 1 or more players
Inside The Dangerous Cave at Deep Sea

string.name: message
string.value: Defeat Horntail, the traitor of the dragon race!
Defeat Horntail, the dragon traitor living in Minar Forest, and obtain the Nine Spirit's Egg.
\n#e-Number of Participants#n: Horntail Expedition, Chaos Horntail Expedition
Below the Dangerous Nest, Cave of Life

string.name: message
string.value: Help Andy in fixing the distorted time!
Andy the time traveler has come from the year 2503 to fix the past. Yet his time travel has failed and he has fallen into Minar Forest. Help Andy however you can.
A hole in time has appeared deep inside the Ludibrium Clocktower. This is the perfect opportunity to eliminate the monster from another world, Papulatus!

string.name: message
string.value: Defeat the monsters in the Monster Park!
#e-Recommended Level#n: Lv. 135 - 144, have Monster Park Ticket
#e-Getting There#n: Monster Park Shuttle in each town or use the Move Quickly menu
Spiegelmann's Badge Chest (30 Monster Park Commemorative Coins needed)
Spiegelmann's Mustache (50 Monster Park Commemorative Coins needed)
Spiegelmann's Autograph (100 Monster Park Commemorative Coins needed)
Spiegelmann's Hot-Air Balloon 7-Day Coupon (70 Monster Park Commemorative Coins needed)
#bStarling#k has sent a call for emergency aid after being attacked by a Black Wing Henchman. Rush to #bKerning City Subway#k to help her.
After answering the emergency call, move to the Kerning City Subway Ticketing Booth\n#b"Subway Construction Site"#k

string.name: message
string.value: Would you like to test your skills?
Ready for a challenge? Want to see how strong you REALLY are? Then go talk to #bSo Gong#k in #bMu Lung Dojo#k.
Want to see how strong you REALLY are? Tnen head to the Mu Lung Dojo to test your skills in challenges that'll pit you against different boss monsters!
Mu Lung Dojo is located in Mu Lung Temple. To enter the dojo, use the Mu Lung Dojo Board at Mu Lung Temple or the Dimensional Mirror located in each town.
To begin your challenges in Mu Lung Dojo, you must first fight the guard of the dojo, So Gong. Once you beat him, you can officially start the dojo's real challenges.
Mu Lung Dojo has 3 difficulties: Normal, Hard, and Ranked Mode. You can enter Normal Mode at Lv. 90, Hard Mode at Lv. 120, and Ranked Mode at Lv. 130.

In Hard Mode, you can accumulate Mu Lung Points based on your performance. Your rank will be determined based on the number of points you've earned in a week, and you'll get special rewards based on this rank.
1. You can only use potions exclusive to Mu Lung Dojo.

You cannot use regular potions in Mu Lung Dojo. As you eliminate monsters in the dojo, they'll drop potions. The effects of these potions kick in the moment you grab them, so pick them up strategically.
\n2. You'll get a buff each time you eliminate a boss monster.
Once you eliminate a boss monster, 10 different buff items will drop. You can only select one, which will activate immediately. The rest will disappear.
There are three different kinds of special skills you can use in the dojo. Just fill up the Kill Gauge at the top left, then enter the command of the skill you want to use.

string.name: message
string.value: Save the Golden Temple before it's too late!
The Golden Temple has been overrun by crazy monkeys! Worse, the monks that guard the temple have started to disappear, one by one. Head to the temple and save it before it's too late!
Upon starting the "Noi the Monk's Plea" quest, \nuse a Dimensional Mirror or the Crane (Taxi) in Mu Lung Temple.

string.name: message
string.value: Unearth the secrets of Fantasy Theme World.

Fantasy Theme World, the latest in Madame Ming's highly-successful line of amusement parks, has officially opened its doors! You'll laugh, you'll cry, you may even wet your pants! Don't miss out on the fun!
Use the cable car to the east of Ludibrium\nafter beginning the "Awkward Celebration" quest.
(Can be obtained after completing the following quests: "Enjoying the Big 3", "Open Event: Treasure Hunt", "Dangerous Performance", "Graffiti Absolutely Forbidden!")
Fantasy Theme World is broken up into three stations: #e<Funky>, <Extreme>, and <Fantasy>#n.
Each station has its own main attraction.
The #e<Ghostacular Mansion>#n#k is the star of Funky Station. You'll find thrills and chills as you face a host of spooky ghosts and ghoulish beasts ready to knock your socks off!
The #e<Gyro Drop>#n#k is the star of Extreme Station. Do you have the guts to drop from the top? The kids love this one!
The #e<Viking>#n#k is the star of Fantasy Station. Relive the excitement of the majestic Nordic warriors in a fun and safe environment!

Complete the rest of the park to get inside the Fantasy Crittertorium, home of the ultimate bear show! Inside, you'll face off with the mighty #eTarga#n and #eScarboss#n, and gain access to unique Fantasy Theme World items!
The corrupted Cygnus Knights have turned Ereve into a Black Mage Stronghold. You're not sure who's side you're on anymore, but there's only one thing left to do!
Temple of Time, Gate to the Future, Cygnus's Chamber
Move to the Gate to the Future from the Temple of Time. Form an Expedition from Cygnus Garden to enter.
You can only move to Cygnus's Chamber from channel 13.
You can only enter twice in one day
Empress Cygnus is summoning hordes of corrupted knights, but the pentacle is protecting her! You must attack when the pentacle's magic weakens!
#bTIP: Stop attacking immediately when the damage reflect spell activates.
Defeat Hilla, the shamaness obsessed with youth and beauty, to free the lost souls of Azwan from her tyrannical reign!
\n#e-Party Size#n: Hilla Expedition of at least 1 player
Take the eastern portal from Nihal Desert, Azwan, and Azwan Refugee Zone to enter.
You can enter through the Dimensional Mirror
Talk to Medina once you form an Expedition. Go through Hilla Tower Entrance to the Azwan Refugee Zone.
You can choose between Normal and Hard Mode when you enter.
You can only enter twice in one day
Hilla will grow stronger every time someone in the Expedition dies. If your Expedition members fall 15 times, Hilla will become too strong to fight and you will have to flee.
Hilla's black magic can summon stone statues that will capture any nearby warriors. Destroy them to free the captives!
Hilla can sacrifice a member of your Expedition to recover her HP. Make sure to save your friends if you see them being targetted!
Medina will appear and use her protective magic to protect the Expedition.
Hilla will visibly age as her magic weakens. Take advantage and put her down!

string.name: message
string.value: Gold Beach is covered in goo!
An exclusive invitation to get a sneak peek at Gold Richie's newest resort before it opens to the public! Check out Gold Beach today!
Talk to Pilot Irvin at the #m104020000#
\n#e-Players#n : Hilla Expedition of 1 or more players
Wait until you receive the quest, A Golden Opportunity, from Gold Richie.
#b(Accept Gold Richie's invitation and visit Gold Beach Resort.)
Talk to Irvin in Gold Beach to start the quest.
\nOnce you complete all the quests, you will face off against the nefarious Captain Darkgoo!

string.name: message
string.value: Nothing but the finest dishes for the Nautilus crew!
If you have passion for making delicious food, take the #bDimensional Mirror#k to Tangyoon's.
2. Control the heat and keep your food from burning by eliminating Tasteburners.
3. Add the right spices to give your food some kick.
\n#e-Getting There#n: Dimensional Mirror in each town
Grendel the Really Old has word from Masteria... what's going on there?
Progress to the quest, To Grendel the Really Old's Library
\n#e-Getting There#n: Dimensional Mirror in each town
Accept the quest, Reading With Grendel.
#b(Meet Grendel the Really Old in the Ellinia Magic Library.)
Take the Dimensional Mirror to Crimsonwood to start the Masteria quest line.
\nComplete all quests and rescue the imprisoned Demons.

string.name: message
string.value: The Stone Colossus has appeared in South Minar Forest!
The Minar Forest is home to a giant... but where did it come from?
Take the #m240010400# in Minar Forest to the Colossus.
Accept the quest, A Giant of a Rumor.
#b(There's talk of a giant rock man. Talk to Chief Tatamo in Leafre.)
Discover the truth behind the Stone Colossus in Minar Forest.

string.name: message
string.value: Help out the Ellinel Fairy Academy!
Something strange is going on at the Ellinel Fairy Academy in Ellinia.
Warp to Ellinel from the portal in the bottom left corner of #m101030000#'s North Forest.
Accept the quest from a Job Instructor or Fanzy.
#b(Meet with Fanzy, then go to Ellinel. )
Go take care of some business at the Ellinel Fairy Academy.

string.name: message
string.value: Help out the Ellinel Fairy Academy!
Something strange is going on at the Ellinel Fairy Academy in Ellinia.
Warp to Ellinel from the portal in the bottom left corner of #m101030000#'s North Forest.
Accept the quest from a Job Instructor or Fanzy.
#b(Meet with Fanzy, then go to Ellinel. )
Go take care of some business at the Ellinel Fairy Academy.

You must return to #b#m930100000##k with the legendary weapons after you defeat the #rTwisted Masters#k of #bTynerum#k! Take the #bDimensional Mirror#k to Crimsonheart Castle and head to Crimsonheart Altar.
\nStage 1: Activate the portal of the Twisted Masters
Stage 2: Evade the obstacles and activate all portals
Stage 3: Defeat the Twisted Masters and return the legendary weapons to the altar
Stage 4: Accept your reward and enter the bonus stage
\n#e-Route#n: Take the Dimensional Mirror to Crimsonheart Castle, then move to #m930100000#.

string.name: message
string.value: Compete against other players at the coliseum!
2-6 players must be present to #breduce the monster's HP and use the #t2270002##k to absorb its power.
\n#e-Route#n: Take the Dimensional Mirror from any town
Obtain from Abdullah VIII or Cesar in the Party Quest wait map\n
A group of 2-6 players will have to capture monsters in the Ariant Coliseum.
Whoever obtains the most Spirit Jewels within the time limit will win the match.
Talk to Cesar in the Party Quest waiting map.
You will be able to compete against other players once you join the waiting list.
Whoever obtains the most Spirit Jewels within the time limit will win the match. Stop other players from collecting jewels to take the lead!
Find out why the people of Riena have formed an alliance against the Frostwitch.
Talk to Puro the Penguin at Lith Harbor to go to Rien.

A mysterious ship has taken up anchor just offshore of Boat Quay Town, and it's believed to be haunted. Only #b#p9270030##k knows what's really going on, but you'll have to help convince him he hasn't gone mad before he can help.
2) Accept the quest, 'Ghosts of the Past'
The evil Captain Latanica is terrorizing Ulu City with an ancient evil ghost. But when an evil ghost comes haunting, who ya gonna call? #b#p9270044##k and the Ulu Patrol Squad!
Malaysia's feeling the heat! Between a nonstop heat wave and a series of attacks at the ever-popular Fantasy Theme Park, the people of Malaysia could use your help.
2) Accept the quest, 'A Bright and Sunny Day'
Someone has broken into the Temple of Time, and the Door to the Past is in ruins! Help the #b#p2140000##k find the culprit and protect the space-time continuum before it's too late.
1) Talk to the #b#p2140000##k at the #bTemple of Time#k
2) Accept the quest, 'Path to the Past'

string.value: Welcome to Maple World!\nUse this Level-Up Guide speed up your progress!
